description: IDEA is a weak encryption algorithm and it's no longer considered secure. It's a key size of 128 bits.
recommendation: Switch to a more secure algorithm like AES or use a different library that has higher security standards. Remember that even stronger encryption algorithms like AES also require the use of secure keys.

vulnerable_code: KeyGenerator keyGen = KeyGenerator.getInstance("AES"); SecretKey key = keyGen.generateKey();
description: Generating a Key using a KeyGenerator and using a constant algorithm name (AES) makes the key generation process vulnerable. An attacker can guess the key generation process and create the key he wants.
recommendation: Do not hard-code the key generation process. Use a secure key generation process. Use a randomly generated key for each encryption operation. Make sure to store keys securely.
